channel.title: agriculture on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in agriculture on Dipankar's blog

item.title: Peepli live ! and rural India
item.description: One frustrating movie after the other, Bollywood intends to kill me ! The flavor of the season seems to be satires, especially political ones. After watching some mythology based stuff in Rajneeti, one has to deal with this other end of the spectrum. Its all good, and giving valuable exposure to the plight of our fellow citizens, the actual drivers of our still agrarian driven economy. What is disappointing is that it shows what exists, but not how to go about resolving it.
